divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving north on Hicksville Rd, just north of Jerusalem Ave. Suddenly abright green light was spotted by both of us at exactly the same time. It wouldhave appeared to have been an airplane or such, except for the fact that it wasgoing straight down at rapid speed and then disappeared. The speed wasdefinitely more than an object would normally fall at. It is because of thisspeed and the fact that it was directly in front of us and we did not see theobject go up before coming down that we knew it cannot have been a firework orground-launched incendiary device. It was far enough that we do not know if itmade sound, yet close enough that we looked down a few streets to see if wecould see it where it may have landed. Witness 2 believes it landed, and quitepossibly the light went out just before landing. Witness 1 believes itdisappeared from view - perhaps the light went out but it was still there.Shortly thereafter (no more than 5 minutes) 3 or 4 helicopters were circling theneighborhood.
Summary: Bright green light ball falling from sky at accele
